issues.title: Where Location Search Non-Functional
issues.description: The location-based search doesn't work - missing Google API key, no fallback, SafeGooglePlacesAutocomplete renders disabled input silently
issues.impact: Users cannot search for providers by location - core functionality broken

issues.title: Login Branding Not Connected
issues.description: Branding image upload exists in admin but login page hardcodes default image instead of fetching from API

issues.title: No Admin API Layer
issues.description: Nova admin used session-based auth with no REST API for admin functions
issues.impact: Required complete API rebuild for new admin portal

issues.title: Migration Compatibility Issues
issues.description: 3 migrations used incompatible Doctrine DBAL methods
issues.impact: Database setup fails without manual fixes

issues.title: Missing Environment Documentation
issues.description: .env.example incomplete, missing required variables like Google API keys
issues.impact: Difficult to set up project from scratch

issues.title: Empty Stripe Integration
issues.description: Stripe tables exist but subscription flow untested/incomplete
issues.impact: Cannot charge customers - SaaS model non-functional

issues.title: Settings API returns all settings including branding
issues.description: CustomerController::getSettings() uses Setting::all() which returns branding records mixed with directory settings, causing TypeError in frontend
issues.impact: Clicking any service in directory crashes the page
